summary: Implemented default Mock/Simulation Mode via a dedicated mock mutation hook and a UI toggle; added a single-source WhatsApp URL constant set to the requested dummy number; updated itinerary parsing to recognize a "Recommended Transport" section and to avoid duplicating the star-title line. However, the diff summary does not provide enough evidence that the deployment safety-flag issue was addressed or that the transport card renders with the exact required title and placement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reset the codebase to the last known working version that successfully deploys (remove/undo any recent changes that trigger the platform safety-flag deployment failure) while keeping the current Goa Planner UI intact.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows frontend changes (mock mode, WhatsApp constant, parsing tweaks). There is no evidence of reverting/undoing the changes that caused the platform safety-flag deployment failure or any build/deploy related fixes.
evidence: file-diff summary shows only frontend additions/modifications: frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/*.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useMockPlanTrip.ts, frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure no other WhatsApp number is used anywhere in the UI for the “Book Now on WhatsApp” CTA (URL must be exactly https://wa.me/919999999999).
missing_requirements.reason: A constant is added with the correct URL and ItineraryResults imports it, but the diff summary does not prove that no other CTA instances elsewhere in the UI still hardcode a different number.

missing_requirements.requirement: Highlighted transport card renders with title text “⭐ Recommended: Rent from Desi Musafir Rentals” and is shown above the Day-wise Plan section in the results view when using Mock Data.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates parsing for “Recommended Transport” and mentions a highlighted transport card in the file summary, but the provided truncated code does not show the rendered card title text nor confirm it is positioned above the Day-wise Plan section.
